 cAnimatedTexture (const char *file, int num_frames, Uint32 frame_time)
 Load a series of textures from one image, where (num_frames) frames are stored horizontally. Provides an animated texture, as opposed to the other two constructors.

Detailed Description

Provides an animated texture with the same interface as cTexture.
